Button Component(btn-primary)

  • .btn.btn-primary : default, hover, is-active, is-disabled

a[href='#'] btn-primary
추가하기

Button Component(btn-secondary)

  • .btn.btn-secondary : default, hover, is-active, is-disabled

a[href='#'] btn-large btn-secondary

Button Component(btn-text)

  • .btn.btn-text : default, hover, is-active, is-disabled

  • 아이콘이 있는 경우 밑줄 없음

btn-text:has(.btn__icon) .is-disabled or :disabled btn-text .is-disabled or :disabled

Button Component(Size) : button

  • btn-large: TBD

  • btn-medium: min-width:160px; height:56px; font-size:18px; font-weight:500;

  • btn-small : min-width:140px; height:48px; font-size:16px; font-weight:400;

  • btn-ultra-small : min-width:88px; height:36px; font-size:16px; font-weight:400;

a[href='#'] large icon right icon left
a[href='#'] medium icon right icon left
a[href='#'] small icon right icon left
a[href='#'] ultra-small icon right icon left

Button Component(Size) : text

btn-text
btn-text:has(btn__icon)

Button Component(align-left / align-right / align-center)

  • .btn 이 하나 있을 경우 모바일 분기에서 width:100% 적용됩니다.

  • align-right 타입은 모바일 분기에서 left 정렬됩니다.
